summary: This mod adds an X-wing starfighter from Star Wars Series. Fly anywhere in Skyrim at a blazing speed!
descriptionHtml:
The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim Mod:


====================================
X-Wing Fighter 
====================================


Author: electionis

Warning:  this is a NON-lorefriendly mod. 


1. Description
2. Requirements
3. Installing the plug-in
4. Playing the plug-in
5. Uninstalling the plug-in
6. Save games
7. Conflicts/Known Errors
8. Credits
9. LEGAL STUFF/ DISCLAIMER
10. Anything else

===============
1. DESCRIPTION
===============
This mod adds an X-wing starfighter from Star Wars Series. Fly anywhere in Skyrim at a blazing speed!! 

1. Where to find it
===================== 
Go to the top of Western watchtower. 

2. How to use it
=====================
A. Piloting
Press "E" to ignite the engine. 
Press "Space bar" to exit.
Press "Left Alt" (Sprint button) to go forward and press again to stop.
Press "W" to go up.
Press "S" to go down.
Press "A" to turn left.
Press "D" to turn right.
Press "R" while flying to rotate sideways

When activated, X-wing will automatically increase its altitude and will start hovering up and down automatically until you press the "sprint button. (left alt)."

B. Firing
Press "Left mouse button" to fire missiles.
Press "Right mouse button" to change your ammunition.
There are 5 types of ammunition: Mixed, Dwemer, Laser, Frost, Shock. You can cycle them by pressing the right mouse button. 
When fighting a dragon in the air, missiles will lock on and seek it out if it is sort-of in front of you when you fire them.
If you have an NPC companion they will take the rear seat on the flyer and take occasional shots at any dragon that is behind the flyer.

C. Maintenance
If the X-wing takes damage in combat it will catch fire. Enough damage and it will break apart in the air. You'll probably die unless you land in water.
To repair damage, equip the 'X wing Repair Hammer' (it's a weapon) and repeatedly hit the X-wing with it. You can find the repair hammer in a container on the top of Western watchtower.

D. Things to remember
If you lose X-wing, land it in deep water, let it fall off a mountain etc., one of the fast-travel carriage drivers will recover it for you at a cost of 50 gold. 
There is little protection against breaking quests by going where you shouldn't. If you're using Open Cities, enter cities by the gate to be sure of triggering any quests. 
The X-wing won't go higher than High Hrothgar to avoid breaking the main quest at one point.


===============
2. Requirements
===============
It requires Skyrim Script Extender 1.6.13 or higher, available from http://skse.silverlock.org, and Skyrim 1.9.32 or higher.


========================
3. INSTALLING THE PLUGIN
========================
Unzip the file into the /data folder where Skyrim is installed.
When prompted to overwrite, click yes to all.


=====================
4. PLAYING THE PLUGIN
=====================
From the Skyrim Launcher, select Data Files and check the box next to the
name of X wing Fighter.esp. 
Make sure you start Skyrim using SKSE launcher.


==========================
5. UNINSTALLING THE PLUGIN
==========================
From the Skyrim Launcher, select Data Files and UNcheck the box next to the
name of X wing Fighter.esp
For a clean uninstallation, find the Skyrim directory and
Delete the following:
1. Data\Meshes\dwemerflyer (<-folder)
2. Data\Textures\electionis\xwing (<-folder)
3. Data\Sound\fx\dwemerflyer (<-folder)
4. Data\X wing Fighter.esp (<-file)
5. Delete everything that starts with dfm in "scripts" folder under Data and check under "Source" folder as well.


============================
6. SAVE GAMES
============================
This is a heavily scripted mod, therefore, it can corrupt your save games like other script oriented mods.


============================
7. CONFLICTS / KNOWN ERRORS
============================
A. This mod is incompatible with Dwemer Flying Machine by AndyW1384
B. There are minor incompatibilities with Ultimate Followers Overhaul; Companions who've been told to 'Relax a while' will still be brought on the flyer, unless they're in an interior or are far away.
C. When high in altitude, every once in a while, X-wing can turn transparent. Sorry, no fix yet. 
D. When speeding, you might experience CTDs. This is due to the limitations of your GPU and CPU power. Those who have a powerful rig shouldn't have any problems with speeding.
Please be aware that this mod is still a work in progress, and contains both known and unknown problems. 



==========
8. CREDITS 
==========
A. Bethesda and Star Wars for the game and concepts.
B. This mod is inspired by the modders resource - Dwemer Flying Machine by AndyW1384  
C. Magicka Sabers by Lord Haun for the laser mesh and texture.

Please endorse if you like this mod.   


==========================
9. LEGAL STUFF/ DISCLAIMER
==========================
Feel free to modify, incorporate into your mod, publish it anywhere on the web as you wish. No need to ask for my permission in any way.


=================
10. ANYTHING ELSE
=================
I plan to add an animation for X-wing (S-foils) in the future, but not guaranteed. I've been working on it, but to no avail. Only succeeded in nif format but not in the game. very frustrating...Any help? ^^ It will be greatly appreciated.
May the force be with you and enjoy!
author: electionis
